content: the chunky seed stitch ear warmer keeps your ears warm and your hair in place by serving double duty as a headband it s a quick knit making it perfect for beginners while the seed stitch pattern elevates it giving it that added detail that will have other commuters envious of its warmth and versatility you can download the full pdf pattern here 1 1 http //craftofthemonthclubblog files wordpress com/2013/12/beginners-chunky-seed-stitch-ear-warmer-dec2013 pdf
